body:
> How is collectivism evil?

Because it is inherently oppressive. It worships some imaginary collective at the expense of real people. And creates enmity and fighting on a mass scale.

> Do you understand you're calling the majority of the human populace evil?

Because they are. "It is not good when all the humans say good things about you, as these are the same things their ancestors did to the false prophets. You are well when the humans hate you and exclude you and insult you and call you evil because of the son of man." - Jesus

> Actually, yeah, nonwhites cannot and do not really entertain the conservative values that Whites do. The nonwhite nations that do function similar to White nations are few and far between. The majority of nonwhites do not vote for conservative values and do not poll for them either. Do you want to sell yourself and your future on exceptions?

Of course not, because you define "conservative values" as European traditions. Europe is mostly white, so it makes sense that European values would be passed down to mostly white people. But that happens for every group of people, whites are no more or less superior. In reality it's all stupid and just humans wanting something to idolize because of their tribal instincts.
body_html:
How is collectivism evil?

Because it is inherently oppressive. It worships some imaginary collective at the expense of real people. And creates enmity and fighting on a mass scale.

Do you understand you're calling the majority of the human populace evil?

Because they are. "It is not good when all the humans say good things about you, as these are the same things their ancestors did to the false prophets. You are well when the humans hate you and exclude you and insult you and call you evil because of the son of man." - Jesus

Actually, yeah, nonwhites cannot and do not really entertain the conservative values that Whites do. The nonwhite nations that do function similar to White nations are few and far between. The majority of nonwhites do not vote for conservative values and do not poll for them either. Do you want to sell yourself and your future on exceptions?

Of course not, because you define "conservative values" as European traditions. Europe is mostly white, so it makes sense that European values would be passed down to mostly white people. But that happens for every group of people, whites are no more or less superior. In reality it's all stupid and just humans wanting something to idolize because of their tribal instincts.

post.body:
The reason they do is because women are sexually selective, and they know most men badly want pussy, so they will use this to manipulate them. Even good people will do this because no one ever taught them it's wrong. The other, probably even bigger reason is because of the Women Are Wonderful Effect. This is the phenomenon where both sexes instinctively care about females but not males. The reason for this is simple: you only need one male to impregnate thousands of females and have a lot of babies. But thousands of males and one female can still only produce one (or a few) babies.

Most people support this because humans have a fetish for it deeply ingrained into their DNA. But in reality it doesn't work out too well and results in simping and failed marriages motivated by sexual desire, and it's very annoying and unfair to people who are asexual or deviate from gender norms. If the exact same person were born the opposite sex, they'd get exponentially more or less sympathy and help from others simply because of that, not because of anything they did or didn't do to deserve it.

guild.description: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!

guild.name: UnpopularOpinion

parent.body:
When I read your post I was reminded of a story I heard years ago. I think it was Pilipino story? Anyway... It was told by a traveler or priest who came to the village only once or twice a year. There was this young woman in the village who wasn't attractive. Not necessarily downright Ugly, but she wasn't what most men would want. All the other young women in the village married, but her. No one wanted her. Then, a young man came from another village and promptly courted her as if she were the most beautiful woman he'd ever seen. He treated her as if she were Beautiful, and worthy. 

A year or so later the traveler comes back to the village and stopped at the young man's farm. He was greeted kindly and asked to stay for dinner. The wife served him and he was extremely confused. This woman was Beautiful. Really beautiful. He thought maybe the young man's wife had died and he'd remarried, but he didn't want to seem rude and ask. He waited until the woman went to bed and the men were left to talk. Finally he was able to ask, Is that your second wife? What happened to the first woman you married? 

And they young man smiled in utter contentment and happiness and answered, That is my first wife. 

The priest was flummoxed. But, that woman had been plain and terribly unattractive. And the young man said, She was always beautiful. She just needed someone to convince her of it. Now I have the most beautiful wife in the whole village. 

Every woman is high value. You simply lack the wisdom to see it. That isn't the fault of the woman. That's a fault in your own soul. When you treat people the way they should be treated--that is, you treat Everyone with respect and kindness and as if they're beautiful, people rise to the occasion and become beautiful. Even a whore can be an amazing wife, and a virgin can be a complete nightmare. And yes, you are an asshole. As long as you're an asshole, you will never find a beautiful woman, or someone worthy, because you, yourself, are incapable of seeing how worthy they are.

This is the phenomenon where both sexes instinctively care about females but not males. The reason for this is simple: you only need one male to impregnate thousands of females and have a lot of babies. But thousands of males and one female can still only produce one (or a few) babies.

Most people support this because humans have a fetish for it deeply ingrained into their DNA. But in reality it doesn't work out too well and results in simping and failed marriages motivated by sexual desire, and it's very annoying and unfair to people who are asexual or deviate from gender norms. If the exact same person were born the opposite sex, they'd get exponentially more or less sympathy and help from others simply because of that, not because of anything they did or didn't do to deserve it.
post.title: Men should not be expected to do everything for women

body: Actual historians. Gay stuff existed LONG before Rome. The Romans were actually the first major society to start hating it. The only thing they considered acceptable was banging a male slave, and you had to be a top. There is even evidence that it was punishable by death. On the other hand the evidence for early Christians believing this is slim to none. There is in fact a bit to the contrary, including that the first gentile convert was asking for his "boy" to be healed. And there is a strong possibility that David and Jonathan's "covenant" was a little more than just being "really good friends", especially considering how Saul reacted and the romantic comments. And if this were an issue for Israel and Judah back then, it would've been edited out because these books generally try to portray the patriarchs as positively as possible.
body_html: Actual historians. Gay stuff existed LONG before Rome. The Romans were actually the first major society to start hating it. The only thing they considered acceptable was banging a male slave, and you had to be a top. There is even evidence that it was punishable by death. On the other hand the evidence for early Christians believing this is slim to none. There is in fact a bit to the contrary, including that the first gentile convert was asking for his "boy" to be healed. And there is a strong possibility that David and Jonathan's "covenant" was a little more than just being "really good friends", especially considering how Saul reacted and the romantic comments. And if this were an issue for Israel and Judah back then, it would've been edited out because these books generally try to portray the patriarchs as positively as possible.

>altering chromosomes from XY to XX

>altering all bone structure and physical structure in general

>vocal change

>adding perfect breasts

body: The most likely candidates to have been cool with it in the first century is...Christians. The only part of the bible I think might actually mention it in the original text is Romans 1, which shows many signs of having been added by a later editor, not that Paul is God in the first place. And contrary to popular belief, the Romans were *not* tolerant. And in fact they're probably the reason for the Abrahamic sex purity culture, because they inserted their bogus ideas when they infiltrated them.
